line.1: Not for one moment do I bring a message to the people that they may follow me, or join my church, or start some fellowship and organization. I have never done that and will not do that now.
line.2: I have no interest in those things, but I do have an interest in the things of God and people, and if I can accomplish just one thing I will be satisfied. That one thing is to see established a true spiritual relationship between God and men, wherein men become new creations in Christ, filled with His Spirit and live according to His Word. I would invite, plead and warn all to hear His voice at this time, and yield your lives completely to Him, even as I trust in my heart that I have given my all to Him. God bless you, and may His coming rejoice your heart.

line.1: Little Storehouse is a collection of sermons by William Marrion Branham in various languages.
line.2: The application offers rich filtering of sermons by date and many other parameters.
line.3: A full text search of all sermons is also available.
line.4: Along with the text of the sermons, audio recordings of the sermons are available.
line.5: Little Storehouse is a non-commercial project.
line.6: It does not claim any rights to the texts of sermons or audio recordings used in the application.

1.title: How to edit highlighted text in Sermon Page

line.1: To edit highlighted text on the Sermon page, follow these steps:
line.2: 1. Tap on the highlighted text you wish to edit.
line.3: 2. On the bottom bar, you can change/edit the color, add a new color, or delete the highlighting.

line.1: Color editing can be done in three ways: via the Edit Highlight bottom bar, the Colors Navigation bar, or the Colors page.
line.2: To edit from the Edit Highlight bottom bar:
line.3: 1. Tap on the selected text in the Sermon page or press and hold on a highlighted item in the Highlights list.
line.4: 2. Press and hold on the Color tile.
line.5: 3. Select a new color value and tap on the 'Save' button.
line.6: To edit from the Colors Navigation bar:
line.7: 1. Tap on the Highlights tile on the Home page.
line.8: 2. Press and hold on the Color tile on the Colors Navigation bar.
line.9: 3. Select a new color value and tap on the 'Save' button.
line.10: To edit from the Colors page:
line.11: 1. Tap on the Highlights tile on the Home page.
line.12: 2. Tap on the Edit Colors button.
line.13: 3. You can change a color's title or value, and also delete a color.

3.title: How to edit a highlight in Highlight List

line.1: You can access the Edit Highlight bottom bar by pressing and holding on a Highlights List item.
line.3: 1. Tap on the Highlights tile on the Home page.
line.4: 2. Press and hold a Highlights List item.
line.5: 3. Edit or remove the highlight using the options in the bottom bar.
